data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 920,208 who are far from you in Fatehabad, Haryana, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Fatehabad, Haryana, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of Fatehabad.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.section_summary: On average, 76 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Fatehabad, Haryana, India.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who are far from you in Fatehabad. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Fatehabad, Haryana, India.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Jat Ghatwal (Hindu traditions) people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Jat Ghatwal (Hindu traditions) people know you.
God, we pray for the believers in Fatehabad, Haryana, India that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Fatehabad, Haryana, India. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the county of Fatehabad a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

location.name: Fatehabad
location.people_groups_list: Jat Kharral (Hindu traditions), Jat Mahil (Sikh traditions), Brahmin Pushkarna, Singiwala, Rajput Jatu
